value: As an Instructor, I want the calendar to have both individual and team views

In order to help reduce the clutter and make it easier to navigate in our app, we wan the ability to toggle whether Instructors are seeing just their own schedule, just a fellow Instructors schedule, or if they are seeing everyones schedule.

Able to toggle between data shown. Toggle 1 - Personal View - Shows only the currently logged in Instructors information Toggle 2 - Team View - Shows the infromation for all instructors Toggle 3 - Chosen View - Shows the informaiton for a given Instructor
